Key Match Events: Zambia were held to a 1-1 draw with Tanzania in their Africa Cup of Nations Group F match on Sunday evening.
Pre-Game Insights: Zambia will fancy their chances against the Taifa Stars as they aim to end a winless run in the Afcon since 2012 when they won the title.
The Taifa Stars lost their opening game 3-0 to Morocco and got their youngster Novatus Miroshi sent off later in the second half.
Post-Match Reflections: Zambia were held to a 1-1 draw with Tanzania in their Africa Cup of Nations Group F match on Sunday evening.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Taifa Stars are still looking for their first win at the Afcon finals with this being their third time to play at the tournament.

Zambia failed to score in only one of their last nine meetings with Tanzania.
